thread.title: BRIEF-Eurazeo FY NAV Per Share at EUR 78.2, UP +13.5% YOY

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eurazeo FY NAV Per Share at EUR 78.2, UP +13.5% YOY
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Eurazeo:
* PROPOSED DIVIDEND OF €1.25 PER SHARE. BONUS SHARE GRANT OF ONE NEW SHARE FOR TWENTY SHARES HELD‍​
* CASH POSITION OF €379 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 * FY CONSOLIDATED NET INCOME EUR 480.1‍​ MILLION VERSUS EYR 588.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* NAV PER SHARE1: €78.2, UP +13.5% COMPARED TO DECEMBER 31, 2016
* FY ADJUSTED EBIT OF FULLY CONSOLIDATED COMPANIES EUR 378.8‍​ MILLION VERSUS EUR 331.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY CONSOLIDATED REVENUE EUR 3.48 BILLION VERSUS EUR 2.94 BILLION YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
